job.description: Commit/Save Orders into the Paazl system

This job sends order data to OMS including not confirmed orders(pending payment or fraud check). The job takes order according to next criteria: 1. Order export status is ready for export. 2. Order status is not canceled or failed. 3. Updates order custom attribute is empty The job makes "Create order" request for each order and set EXPORTED status if the call is successful.

step.description: This Job creates the projects to the TMS and then deletes the temp project records from the SFCC.

TMS Sync Scheduler Job will sync up the TMS data with SFCC.
This Job will download the translated content from TMS and import in SFCC.
This job deletes all the translation completed jobs from the SFCC and updates the projects in TMS as COMPLETED
